dashboard.readout

Class BufferReadout

  • java.lang.Object
    • acm.graphics.GObject
      • acm.graphics.GCompound
        • dashboard.readout.Readout
          • dashboard.readout.BufferReadout
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    acm.graphics.GContainer, acm.graphics.GScalable, Incrementable, StringUpdatable, java.lang.Cloneable

    public final class BufferReadout
extends Readout
implements Incrementable, StringUpdatable
    Implements a Readout that represents a scrollable graphical buffer of text. The BufferReadoutControl is specially designed to control the BufferReadout, although custom controllers can also be created.
    Author:
    Mark Sabini

      • update

        public void update(java.lang.String msg)
        Updates the BufferReadout with the specified message. Internally, the BufferReadout will only store what can fit on its screen.
        Specified by:
        update in interface StringUpdatable
        Parameters:
        msg - the string with which to update the class
